body.name: Mini Projector, TOWOND Portable Projector 1080P Full HD 10000Lumens Supported, Home Theater Indoor Outdoor Video Projector Compatible with TV Stick, HDMI, USB, Smartphone, PC, Game Console
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 21 mins
features: Native 1080 P Mini Projector: This mini projector supports native 1080 P resolution, 10000 lumens, 8000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio, 16:9/4:3 aspect ratio, 100%-75% zoom function, can project a screen up to 200 inches (50-150 inches recommended), and supports front and rear projection. Upgraded LED technology has high light transmittance, high refractive index, and low dispersion characteristics. Restore real and colorful pictures and experience the impact of the pictures immersively.

Noise Reduction Technology and High-quality Speakers: The movie projector uses advanced noise reduction technology, and the fan can reduce noise by 40%. The cooling system can effectively cool down the heat of the projector lamp, allowing the lamp service life to reach 6,500 hours. The video projector has high-quality speakers built into it, or you can use Bluetooth to connect headphones or speakers to enhance your experience (Bluetooth only works with external speakers, not with smartphones).

Compact Size and Widely Used Scenarios: The portable projector measures only 4.6*3.6*5.3 inches and weighs only 1.4 pounds. Light weight, small size, fashionable and portable, can be easily put into the bag. This is an excellent choice, whether as a gift for children, or for home use, video games, parties, yoga exercises, and outdoor travel.

Connect a Variety of Devices: Equipped with HDMI, USB, 3.5mm interfaces, you can easily connect TV Stick, Phone, USB flash drive, tablet, laptop, PC, game console, external speakers, etc. (Please note: Due to HDCP copyright protection, Netflix /Disney/Hulu prohibits playing movies directly from the projector, please use a TV stick to play).

Lifetime Customer Service Support: We provide a comprehensive after -sales system, enjoy professional customer service and technical support for life, so that you don't need to worry. If you encounter any problems during use, please contact me directly on Amazon, and I will help you.

Why is there no sound when the projector plays video? This projector does not support Dolby sound. If there is no sound when playing a video, please turn off Dolby sound. Why won't the projector play videos from Hulu,Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, etc.? Due to the HDCP (High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection) agreement, copyrighted videos such as Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, and Netflix must be played through Roku,Fire Stick, laptop,or computer. Does the projector connect to mobile phones? Yes, the projector can be connected to phones. You will need to use an adapter (not included) that connects to your phone. Why can't my phone use the Bluetooth function to connect to the projector? The Bluetooth function is only used for audio transmission with audio devices and does not support video synchronization with smartphones and computers. Smartphones and computers cannot be connected to the projector using Bluetooth. I want to give this projector as a gift to my child, but I'm wondering if the size is too big? This mini projector has been reduced in size but upgraded with a projector lens for a clearer projection. The mini size is perfect for gifting to children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great design for small rooms
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my kid room and it is perfect fit for kids room. It would have better if sound quality is little better but I will be using a bluetooth speaker. Overall features are good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s amazing project, we love it! It’s like a tv.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The project has everything you are looking for, if you want to watch some serie or films, you can watch everything because you can connect your laptop or use the Apps both works, is easy to use, the Wi-fi works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cannot connect to my wifi
reviews.reviewText: I finally have time to use this projector and bought it over a month ago. I just took it out of the box and for some reason it will not connect to my wifi. It keeps giving the message: connection failed. I cannot find a way to contact the company. This is super frustrating as the return window has closed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working really good
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This proyector surprises me, great resolution for a nice price, the sound is not good at all but you can add your Bluetooth speaker easily, even with illumination the definition is very good, I'll plan my movies nights with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear vivid image that is big enough to enjoy any movie or game
reviews.reviewText: The Mini Projector delivers an impressive 1080P Full HD experience in a compact, portable design. Its vibrant display and user-friendly interface make it a great choice for on-the-go entertainment. However, keep in mind that its brightness may be limited in well-lit environments. Overall, a solid option for those seeking quality projection in a small package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and mighty
reviews.reviewText: The TOWOND Mini Projector is a portable and versatile solution for your home entertainment needs. It supports 1080P Full HD resolution with an impressive brightness of 10000 lumens, making it suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. The projector is compatible with various devices, including TV sticks, HDMI sources, USB drives, smartphones, PCs, and game consoles. With its compact design, you can easily take it wherever you go, transforming any space into a home theater experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Awesome this work very well in sunshine, I loved that

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it! Super easy to connect en the quality is amazing. You can watch in high definition which is great and easy to connect with the wifi and start to use. Highly recommended
